entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this evening. 60 percent chance of flurries over higher terrain this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 4 May 2023
